ASX: XML metafile of Windows Media .asf files

MSOffice.AM: Runs as a VBA macro in the Microsoft Access application (version 97 or later)
MSOffice.CM: Runs as a VBA macro in the Corel Draw! application (version 9.0 or later)
MSOffice.O97M: Office 97, 2000, XP, 2003, 2007, and 2010 macros - those that affect Word, Excel, and Powerpoint
MSOffice.OM: Uses or runs in two or more applications in the Office 97 suite or later, including related products (Visio, Projects)
MSOffice.PPM: Runs as a VBS macro in Microsoft PowerPoint (version 97 or later)
MSOffice.PUM: Runs as a VBS macro in Microsoft Publisher (version 97 or later)

WMA: Runs as a Windows media Audio file (usually disguised as mp3)
WMV: Runs as a Windows media Video file (usually disguised as avi)
